oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Magnetic-properties of re(2)ni(3)si(5) (re=nd, tb and dy)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAZUMDAR, C
NAGARAJAN, R
GUPTA, LC
PADALIA, BD
VIJAYARAGHAVAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ce2ni3si5
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Magnetic properties of Dy2Ni3Si5 and the two new materials Nd2Ni3Si5 and Tb2Ni3Si5 are presented. Both Nd2Ni3Si5 and Dy2Ni3Si5 order antiferromagnetically with T-N approximate to 9.5 K. Tb2Ni3Si5 shows two distinct magnetic transitions at T-N1 approximate to 19.5 K and at T-N2 approximate to 12 K. In the paramagnetic state, all these materials exhibit Curie-Weiss behaviour.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS,140,917-918
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Magnetism - ICM 94 (13th IUPAP Triennial Conference on Magnetism),WARSAW, POLAND,AUG 22-26, 1994
